# The `WebAssemblyDebugValueManager.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

This file contains the declaration of the WebAssembly-specific manager for DebugValues associated with the specific MachineInstr.

This pass currently does not handle DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LISTs; they are assumed to have been set to undef in NullifyDebugValueLists pass. TODO Handle DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LIST
